```{r}
library(prob)

library(janitor)
```

```{r}
titanic <- read_csv('data/titanic.csv')
```

```{r}
glimpse(titanic)
```
```{r}
distinct(titanic)
sum(is.na(titanic))

```
```{r}

```


```{r}
survival_pass <- titanic %>% 
  filter(survived == "yes")

total_survival <- nrow(survival_pass) / nrow(titanic)
```

```{r}
survival_crew <- titanic %>% 
  filter(survived == "yes") %>% 
  summarise(crew = unique(age))

crew_survive <- nrow(survival_crew) / nrow(titanic)

```
